entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Store list of instantiated types in MIBC #78432
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] Tracking issue: Jiterpreter cleanup and improvements #78428
  • CI rerun fails with "Artifact * already exists for build #." #78427
  • [API Proposal]: Idea for a convenient Replace. area-system-runtime #78423
  • [MONO][Marshal] Remove unused marshal-noilgen code #78422
  • VSMac Crash Reports Missing Frames #78421
    8.0.0
  • Enable more style checking analyzers #78414
  • Warn on analyzer crashes in runtime repo #78412
  • Debug symbols on Linux in Native AOT have lots of DWARF errors #78410
    8.0.0
  • Length calculation in objwriter looks suspicious #78409
    8.0.0
  • [Analyzer] Replacing direct LoggerExtensions.Log* usage with source-generated logging methods #78406
    Future
  • Please add a function to Color such as Color.FromHDR(Long) for Visual Basic and Visual C# 2022. #78403
  • [Analyzer] Usage of ToString in logging source generator method call sites #78402
    Future
  • [Analyzer] Lift arrays of literals to static fields #78398
  • [Analyzer] Async methods that don't take a CancellationToken #78397
  • [Analyzer] Unawaited / returned tasks created with a disposable in using block for that disposable #78394
  • [Analyzer] Recommend string.StartsWith(c) instead of string.StartsWith("c") #78392
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: `OperatingSystem.IsWasi()` #78389
    8.0.0
  • [Analyzer] Make types declared in an executable internal #78388
  • Probable wrong codegen or stack corruption in .NET 7.0.0 #78387
  • Numerical < and == comparisons aren't fused into <= #78385
    8.0.0
  • Deadlock with SystemEvents when application is shutdown #78384
  • IComparer<T> constraint leads to worse codegen than IComparisonOperators<T,T,bool> constraint #78383
  • Uri.TryCreate returns true for relative Uri which contains non-valid characters #78381
  • [tests] System.Numerics.Vectors.Tests hitting Failed to sign the app on iOS device arm64 #78380
  • Self contained WPF app's cold start can be 2-3 seconds #78379
  • Regression in System.Tests.Perf_Boolean.TryParse #78408
  • Regressions in System.Collections.IterateForEach<String> #78407
  • Regressions in System.IO.Tests.Perf_File #78405
  • CA2007 for Durable function Orchestrations #78371
  • How to use the right certificate from a .NET Keystore for a .NET SSL application on linux #78369
  • .NET Native AOT warnings from System.Net.Http #78367
  • When a delegate is created from a `DynamicMethod`, the `Method` property returns a `MethodInfo` which does not implement `CreateDelegate` #78365
  • [release/6.0] Assertion failed in FormatHalf in Number.Formatting.cs in Linux musl #78361
  • Inlined ReadOnlySpan<char> parameter lacks string-like optimizations #78359
    8.0.0
  • [release/7.0][wasm] Interpreter assertion failure for `System.Xml.RW.XmlWriterApi.Tests` with *AOT* #78358
  • Switches with intrinsic const aren't getting optimized #78356
    8.0.0
  • Proposal: ConfigurationBinder Testing Refactor #78353
    Future

Closed

  • [API Proposal]: Random.Shuffle #78419
  • Test failure baseservices\exceptions\simple\ParallelCrashWorkerThreads\ParallelCrashWorkerThreads.cmd #77791
  • .NET 7: incorrect order of arguments when calling the `ConfigurationDebugViewContext` constructor #78306
    8.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Android mono CI JIT failure: The following constructor parameters did not have matching fixture data: _Global globalVar #78360
  • Regressions in System.IO.Tests.StreamReaderReadLineTests #78401
  • Idea for a convenient Replace #78373
  • [Analyzer]: Unexpected allocation when converting arrays to spans #69577
    Future
  • [wasm] Test failing on nodejs - `SocketsHttpHandlerTest_HttpClientHandlerTest_Headers_Http11.ResponseHeaders_ExtraWhitespace_Trimmed` #77631
    8.0.0
  • Exception Thrown when combining Polymorphic Records /w JsonNamingPolicy.SnakeCaseLower #78366
  • Multiple mono JIT tests are failing on iOSSimulator in outerloop #64945
    8.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger][tests] Retry when we fail to get the connection string from chrome #64931
    8.0.0
  • CLR-x86-JIT/V1-QFE, CLR-x86-JIT/V1.1-M1-Beta1, CLR-x86-JIT/V1.2-M01 (55 tests total) #78355

PullRequests

Created

  • Removing outdated unused r2rdump tests #78431
    area-R2RDump-coreclr
  • CreateSegment events #78430
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Fixing typo in area-owners #78429
    area-Meta
  • [release/7.0] [mono][wasm] Handle delegates decorated with [UnmanagedFunctionPointe… #78426
  • Add sdcardfs to filesystems list #78424
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0] Fix ALC lookup from the DAC #78420
    Servicing-consider, area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr, 7.0.x
  • Add check for interval->writeThru in the assert #78418
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Release/7.0][PERF]Fix Mono Dotnet Generation #78413
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [Release/6.0][PERF] Fix perf repo branch setup target, tool build, and mono-dotnet create #78411
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] source build backports #78395
    area-Infrastructure, 7.0.x
  • [wasm] Add intrinsics for BitOperations zero count #78391
    area-System.Numerics, 8.0.0
  • Don't inline anything in BBJ_THROW #78386
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Use compile time handle for instruction comments on xarch too #78382
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove usage of ComPlus_ variables in tests #78377
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • new RID: wasi-wasm #78376
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • WIP: Poof of concept port of interleave feature #78374
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0] Fix DiagnosticSource to work with NativeAOT (#76109) #78372
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Don't emit frozen string literals for rare code paths #78370
    NO-MERGE, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix the TimeSpan comment about internal representation. #78364
    community-contribution
  • [wasm] Use Helix's retry mechanism to re-run debugger tests on CI if .. #78357
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, area-Debugger-mono
  • Update assembly version from hardcoded to MajorVersion #78354
    area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Updating fabricbot area pods #78415
    area-Meta
  • Introduce WASM JITs for interpreter opcodes, do_jit_call, and interp_entry wrappers #76477
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-meta-mono
  • [release/7.0] Bump 6.0.12 #78331
    area-Infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • [release/7.0] Add workload win-arm64 support #78416
    area-Build-mono
  • [MONO] Move Marshal-ilgen into a component #75542
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [release/6.0] Add workload win-arm64 support #78417
    area-Build-mono
  • [wasm] Test for header trimming not supported on NodeJS #78375
    arch-wasm, area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • Fix ALC lookup from the DAC #78400
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Fix Parameter order passed to ConfigurationDebugViewContext #78352
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • Various support changes and cleanups for the jiterpreter PR #78225
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Trigger AVX-512 pipeline on PRs, not merges #78351
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [PERF] Fix mono dotnet creation #78257
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Fix handling generic custom attributes #78304
    Servicing-approved, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono] Force AOT+interpreter for iOSSimulator arm64 library test local build #76551
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [release/7.0] [wasm][debugger] Don't escape accented letters #78217
    Servicing-approved, area-Debugger-mono

Updated

  • Improve the handling of Create, CreateScalar, and CreateScalarUnsafe for vectors #78236
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Adding EVEX encoding support for CV path. #78044
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Make JIT<->EE printing methods consistent and support nested classes when printing class names #76505
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, needs-author-action
  • [wasm][debugger][libs] Documentation: How to debug library tests #77368
    documentation, arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Fix thread-safety issues with enumerating ResourceManager. #75054
    area-System.Resources, community-contribution
  • [hot_reload] Add instance fields #76462
    area-EnC-mono
  • Address Sanitizer support in CoreCLR #74623
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, tenet-reliability, area-Infrastructure
  • Fixes around virtual method hierarchy validation #78157
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Adding check on R2RDump #78343
    area-R2RDump-coreclr
  • Allow interop resolvers to return self handle #78004
    area-AssemblyLoader-mono, community-contribution
  • Extend ProcessStartInfo to allow setting LOGON_NETCREDENTIALS_ONLY #77637
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Use DOTNET_EnableCrashReport to create dumps #77578
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add Generic Enum.TryFormat() #71590
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Replace successive "ldr" and "str" instructions with "ldp" and "stp" #77540
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono] Fix support for generic custom attributes. #78091
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Adding the Vector512 and Vector512<T> types #76642
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Linker into runtime2 #78077
    NO-MERGE, area-Tools-ILLink, 8.0.0
  • [mono][jit] Rework the implementation of __arglist to be platform ind… #78329
  • [wasi][draft] build WASI #77823
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, 8.0.0
  • Add ability for crossgen2 to synthesize PGO histograms #77683
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [JIT] X64/ARM64 - Minor optimizations for small types on `ADD`, `SUB`, `MUL`, `AND`, `OR`, `XOR`, `NOT`, `NEG` #77874
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add support for dehydrated runtime data structures #77884
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [JIT] - Fixed sub-optimal optimization for `a % 1` to Zero #77760
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implement unmanaged-to-managed direction for vtable stub generator #77130
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • Set IsDynamicCodeCompiled as a managed constant to help #72762
    area-CoreLib-mono
  • Replacing exception strings with those stored in the resx file (#34056) #78341
    area-CoreLib-mono, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • avoid alpn allocation on windows #74619
    area-System.Net.Security, os-windows, 8.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Objective-C Marshal: object tracker support #78280
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [Android] Improvements to remote certificate verification in SslStream #77386
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Add simple Else conditions to If Conversion #77728
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • ArgOutOfRangeException throw helpers #78222
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Handle zero value modulus for OpenSSL 1.1 #78339
    area-System.Security
  • Use helpers for implicit casts in importer #78279
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Use zero register in csel when possible #78330
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono] Unify invoke code with coreclr #72717
    area-System.Reflection, 8.0.0
  • [wasm][libs] Fix `WasmAppHost`, and `AppBundle` for library tests #77719
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Revert don't need to escape special characters anymore #78320
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Subject src-gen serializer to full number-handling tests #78010
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Initial JIT test merging #78259
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Manually backporting #74599 to 6.0 take 2 #78247
    NO-MERGE, area-Serialization, 6.0.x
